termAdult.title: Are you over 18?
termAdult.description: You need to be 18 years old or above to access

termConditions.title: Fostering a positive, inclusive, and safe environment
termConditions.description: We develop and use tools and offer resources to our community members that help to make their experiences positive and inclusive, including when we think they might need help. We also have collaborate with teams that work to combat abuse and violations of our Terms and policies, as well as harmful and deceptive behavior. We use all the information we have-including your information-to try to keep our platform secure.
